section.heading: Additional educational opportunities.
section.text: This subchapter shall not be construed to prohibit the University from offering eligible parents, caretaker relatives, or legal guardians eligible pursuant to this subchapter additional financial assistance, additional educational opportunities free of charge or at reduced charge, or other assistance supplemental to or in addition to the minimum requirements specified by this subchapter.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added Feb. 18, 1988, D.C. Law 7-74, § 2, 34 DCR 7946
